meta.author: Thanattsitt
meta.description: Portfolio data for creative professional showcasing AI, design, web development and voice acting projects

portfolio.title: AI-Powered Creative Assistant
portfolio.description: A machine learning model that assists designers in generating creative concepts and iterating on design ideas while maintaining human creative control.
portfolio.detailedDescription: This project involved developing a neural network that suggests design variations based on initial human input, significantly speeding up the creative process while preserving artistic intent.
portfolio.testimonial: This tool reduced our concept development time by 60% while improving design quality.

portfolio.title: Multilingual E-commerce Platform
portfolio.description: A responsive e-commerce solution with AI-powered product recommendations and multilingual support for global market expansion.
portfolio.detailedDescription: Built a React-based platform with Node.js backend implementing real-time translation and localized shopping experiences for 12 languages.

portfolio.title: Interactive Voice Experience
portfolio.description: An immersive audio storytelling platform combining professional voice acting with AI-generated ambient soundscapes for enhanced narrative experiences.
portfolio.detailedDescription: Developed an audio engine that dynamically adjusts background sounds and music based on listener reactions detected through voice analysis.

portfolio.title: Visual Recognition System
portfolio.description: Custom computer vision solution for automated quality control in manufacturing, reducing inspection time by 75% while maintaining 99% accuracy.
portfolio.detailedDescription: Implemented a PyTorch-based system that detects microscopic defects in automotive parts with higher accuracy than human inspectors.

portfolio.title: Creative Agency Brand Identity
portfolio.description: Complete brand identity and digital presence design for a creative agency, including logo design, website development, and marketing materials.
portfolio.detailedDescription: Developed a comprehensive visual identity system with responsive website, business collateral, and social media templates that increased client engagement by 200%.

portfolio.title: Intelligent Chatbot Platform
portfolio.description: Multi-language customer service chatbot with sentiment analysis and escalation protocols, improving customer satisfaction by 40%.
portfolio.detailedDescription: Built an NLP-powered chatbot that handles 80% of routine inquiries in 7 languages, with seamless handoff to human agents when needed.

sectionInfo.title: Portfolio
sectionInfo.subtitle: A showcase of my latest work in AI innovation, creative design, and digital experiences.

seo.title: Professional Portfolio | AI, Design & Development Projects
seo.description: Explore my innovative projects combining artificial intelligence, creative design and web development expertise.
